x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact: Clinical advice on the supplements to take in coordination with the lifestyle patterns.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: For the diet and lifestyle that one partakes, there may be an insufficient or imbalance of vitamin/nutrients that works towards overall body health or body proportion.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

Virtual Agent - To feed information on lifestyle practice and determine what is lacking for the body.
AI Machine Learning - To better understand the lifestyle patterns and predict trends.
Knowledge article - Notes on good health practices.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Connector to available supplements directory to identify supplier and source for recommendation.
Collect and train on tackling different lifestyle patterns, track changes or improvement to a person body proportion.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Lack of local supply to the supplements
Ethical issue of artificial intake of supplements instead of making changes for a healthier lifestyle.
